name: Sunny 2 Bed Apt By Boston Childrens Hosptial, NEU
description:
Comfortable 2 bedroom located right in the Longwood area, nearby Brigham & Women’s Hospital, Dana Farber, Boston Children’s Hospital, Beth Israel, Mass Eye and Ear at Longwood, Northeastern, Harvard Medical and other Universities. Walking close by you will find nearby Parks and Recreation, Stop and Shop, Walgreens, Various Restaurants, Museum of Fine Arts, Green Line T... Bright apartment with nice views and sunny balcony, modern kitchen, large bedrooms with lovely views and plenty closet space.
